item.title: Symptoms Assistant
item.description: We like to think of Symptoms Assistant as our contribution to the community. This App allows you to record the most common symptoms (e.g. coughing, sneezing, fever) along with the most common vital signs (e.g. pulse, temperature, blood sugar) and track their progress over a period of time from one to 30 days. Download now

item.title: FaciliCenter
item.description: Facility issue reporting and tasks management Modern alternative to paper grids and clumsy phone assistance FaciliCenter Software Solution supports real-time interaction between you and the users of your facilities and any self-service or shared equipment. With FaciliCenter Software Solution, you’re not only very reactive to usersâ€™ issue reporting and reviews, but you can also be proactive by planning cleaning and maintenance tasks and handling any issues or deviations from the planned tasks.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Questions or Comments? Questions, comments or suggestions about our products? We would love to hear about them. We are committed to listen to our customers and users. General questions or comments? We are all ears! Terpomo Software
